GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article given an article ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for given article ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts comment to the database and serves the posted comment

comment.body: what does this mean for bananas?
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: updates number of votes of an article

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment from database by id

GET /api/articles?sort_by=author&order=d.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by given queries

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles?topic=mitch.description: serves an array of all articles filtered by topic
